Steps.StepString: Analyze the source code of the webpage containing the button
Send a POST request with two values: 'generate' and 'score'
Use CURL to send a POST request with a score over 999999
Include 'generate' value in the POST request
Send the POST request with CURL, using the command: curl --request POST --form 'generate=Give+a+try%21' --form 'score=1000000' http://challenge01.root-me.org/web-serveur/ch56/
